description: Rinat Akhmetshin, the Russian lobbyist, also attended the June 2016 meeting between Donald Trump Jr. and a Russian lawyer. In 2015, a Netherlands-based mining company accused Mr. Akhmetshin of hacking into its computer systems and unlawfully disseminating confidential information as part of a smear campaign by a rival Russian firm. The firm later dropped its lawsuit and withdrew all allegations.
title: Read the Complaint Filed Against Rinat Akhmetshin
title_page: Read the Complaint Filed Against Rinat Akhmetshin - The New York Times
